author: Reuters Editorial
title: Singapore reports 65 new coronavirus cases, taking total to 1,114
description: Singapore reported 65 more coronavirus cases on Friday, taking the city-state's total cases of the disease to 1,114.
content:
SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Singapore reported 65 more coronavirus cases on Friday, taking the city-state’s total cases of the disease to 1,114. 
The country suffered its fifth coronavirus-related death on Friday. 
Reporting by John Geddie and Anshuman Daga; edit… [+17 chars]
